Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DiskInstancePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PartitionOffset" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: Volume removed: volume %1 disk %3 offset %4 deleted %5.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DiskInstancePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PartitionOffset" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="Deleted" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Spaces conversion started: volume %1 disk %3 offset %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DiskInstancePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PartitionOffset" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: Spaces conversion cancelled: volume %1 disk %3 offset %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DiskInstancePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PartitionOffset" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: Spaces conversion complete: volume %1 disk %3 offset %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DiskInstancePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PartitionOffset" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>
